description: Equip: Holy Shock protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 18 sec, absorbing damage equal to 20% of the Holy Shock every 6 sec. Can protect up to 5 targets.
Equip: While Bladestorm is active, you automatically cast a total of 2 Mortal Strikes at random nearby enemies.

Equip: Light of Dawn's range is increased to 40 yards. All allies within your Light of Dawn benefit from Mastery: Lightbringer as though they were within 10 yards for 6 sec.

Word of Glory receives 50% increased benefit from your Mastery.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: Casting Fel Devastation summons an allied Havoc Demon Hunter who casts Eye Beam.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 8 sec.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: While Stealth is active and for 4 sec after breaking Stealth, your Critical Strike chance is increased by 100%.
